sentences.sContent: With the baboon you first reward a hop, then a bigger hop, then an even bigger hop.
sentences.sContent_eng: With the baboon you first reward a hop, then a bigger hop, then an even bigger hop.
sentences.sCn: 对狒狒，你先奖励它的小进步，然后是大一点的进步，接着是更大的进步。

sentences.sContent: We found a very developed foetus from the bat, and the baboon gave birth five days after the event was witnessed.
sentences.sContent_eng: We found a very developed foetus from the bat, and the baboon gave birth five days after the event was witnessed.
sentences.sCn: 我们发现蝙蝠体内有一个很成熟的胎儿，那只狒狒也在此事过后五天生了幼仔。

trans.tranOther: a large monkey that lives in Africa and South Asia
